name: Berea College Capoeira Club
notes: Mentioned as one of nine student dance clubs at Berea College. No contact info or schedule available. SOURCE: website 4/16/18
rawRecord:
Berea College Capoeira Club
"Nine student dance clubs include swing dance, Latin dance, Danish
gymnastics, dance team, hip-hop, step team,       capoeira, Middle
Eastern dance, and African dance."
SOURCE: https://www.berea.edu/visitor-center/fine-arts/  4/16/18
